entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
